title: masterpiece
review: Great scenario and exceptional set design! There is obvious chemistry among the actors.

title: Great movie
review: Really good scenario , acting and sound design. The story is really touching and there is a big plot twist. I really recommend it!

title: I would watch it again!
review: Really good scenario and the most remarkable thing was the fact that the bright and pleasant landscapes were in complete contrast with the dark theme .This makes grounds for an interesting plot twist.
